title.narrative: Rebooting GMIS: Upscaling digital manufacturing capacities and advancing ISID through the fourth industrial revolution

description.narrative: The Global Manufacturing and Industrialisation Summit (GMIS) is a multi-stakeholder platform, co-chaired by UNIDO and the Ministry of Energy and Industry of the United Arab Emirates. GMIS has a long-term goal to establish a global consensus on the future of manufacturing, fully aligned with the Sustainable Development Goal 9: “Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation”. The project proposal aims to enhance UNIDO’s visibility in the international debate on the Fourth Industrial Revolution/digitalization and to contribute to the implementation of its ISID mandate, the Abu Dhabi Declaration and the 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development.
